content: Has anyone been able to get search and diff links working in the IGs? I'm looking at the way it was done in the FHIR spec, but I don't see a clear way to get that functionality with the IG tooling?
the IGs should be included in the overall search for fhir, but I need to do work in this space generally
Happy to help, just need to know where to poke. I'm trying to add it to the FHIRPath and CQL specs.
hmm did I post the updated FHIRPath spec for ballot?
well, it requires a cfm with some server side stuff. And we where kind of in process for setting up solr instead of google or bing... but I needed server side support... will put it back on my list
